short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We're all about consumer reviews. Get the real inside story from shoppers like you. Read, write and share reviews on Trustpilot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attention users! ⏰ July 2024 marks the end for this extension. Get the latest version for seamless Trustscore checks without leaving the site you’re on!

See the latest Trustpilot extension here: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/trustpilot-reviews-rating/dimkjjladgaekdlfebknbaooicmfalke 

- - -

Use this extension to find out if the company website you're visiting is trusted by your fellow consumers.  Once installed, you can easily gauge people's opinion by looking at the Trustpilot star which will appear next to your bookmark icon.
 
The star will only appear if the site has reviews. A red star means the reviews are mainly negative while a green star indicates that consumers are generally pleased. To see the reviews just click on the star and a new tab will open up to the company profile.

Read more about Trustpilot on www.trustpilot.com.
